tool_description: Checks real-time product availability across locations with allocation tracking and fulfillment feasibility analysis.

product_id.description: Product identifier to check availability for

max_split_locations.description: Maximum locations to split order across (1-10)

error_messages: Invalid product ID: Product not found in system.
Invalid quantity: Requested quantity must be a positive integer.
Invalid preferred location: One or more location IDs do not exist.
Split location limit: max_split_locations must be between 1 and 10.
Availability check failed: Unable to retrieve current stock information.
usage: Provide product_id and requested_quantity to check availability. Specify preferred_locations to prioritize certain warehouses. Set max_split_locations to control order fragmentation.

available_quantity.description: Total quantity available across all locations

estimated_fulfillment_date.description: Expected date when full quantity could be available
